00016 package pl.mg6.android.maps.extensions;
00017 
00018 import pl.mg6.android.maps.extensions.impl.ExtendedMapFactory;
00019 import android.os.Bundle;
00020 
00021 import com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMapOptions;
00022 
00023 public class SupportMapFragment extends com.google.android.gms.maps.SupportMapFragment {
00024 
00025         // value taken from google-play-services.jar
00026         private static final String MAP_OPTIONS = "MapOptions";
00027 
00028         public static SupportMapFragment newInstance() {
00029                 SupportMapFragment f = new SupportMapFragment();
00030                 return f;
00031         }
00032 
00033         public static SupportMapFragment newInstance(GoogleMapOptions options) {
00034                 SupportMapFragment f = new SupportMapFragment();
00035                 Bundle args = new Bundle();
00036                 args.putParcelable(MAP_OPTIONS, options);
00037                 f.setArguments(args);
00038                 return f;
00039         }
00040 
00041         private GoogleMap map;
00042 
00043         public GoogleMap getExtendedMap() {
00044                 if (map == null) {
00045                         com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap realMap = super.getMap();
00046                         if (realMap != null) {
00047                                 map = ExtendedMapFactory.create(realMap, getActivity());
00048                         }
00049                 }
00050                 return map;
00051         }
00052 }
